titles.title: Thou Sweet Beloved Will Of God (easy sweet)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou sweet beloved Will of God My anchor ground My fortress hill My spirit's silent Fair abode In Thee I hide me And am still{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Will that Willest good alone Lead Thou the way Thou guidest best A little child I follow on And trusting lean Upon Thy breast{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God's will doth make The bitter sweet And all is well When it is done Unless His will Doth hallow it The glory of All joy is gone{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy beautiful Sweet will my God Holds fast in its Sublime embrace My captive will A gladsome bird Prison'd in such A realm of grace{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Within this place Of certain good Love evermore Expands her wings Or nestling in Thy perfect choice Abides content With what it brings{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh lightest burden Sweetest yoke It lifts It bears my happy soul It giveth wings To this poor heart My freedom is Thy grand control{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Upon God's will I lay me down As child upon Its mother's breast No silken couch Nor sofest bed Could ever give me Such deep rest{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy wonderful Grand will my God With triumph now I make it mine And faith shall cry A joyous Yes To every dear Command of Thine{/lang-eng}
